Articles.Content: Nobody has been nagging and asking when the next update comes out. Either this forum is filled with the coolest pack of patient gamers ever, or it is common knowledge for those who know where to look. Have I missed it somewhere, or are you guys simply a bizarre group of polite people?

Nobody has been nagging and asking when the next update comes out. Either this forum is filled with the coolest pack of patient gamers ever, or it is common knowledge for those who know where to look. Have I missed it somewhere, or are you guys simply a bizarre group of polite people?

No, just that it's against the rules to ask. We're far from patient.
Squad doesn't give release dates and pestering them for one or speculating about when it will come out is generally frowned upon.
AH, gotcha. Should I delete this post, then?
...as soon as I figure out how...
SHHHHH before the mods see.....keep quiet when asking for release dates. like really really quiet. like almost silent. like really really silent. like don't ask.

Pretty much what everyone just said. The answer to any release-date-related question is "SoonTM."

And don't worry about deleting the thread. It'll soon drop off the end of page 1.

Take care and have fun!

Edited June 27, 2014 by technicalfool
